subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Sweep Tuning of AM Radio Band - FWIW
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I get those angels too, especially when I first power up a new system, 
usually I'm not recording, and they tend to be all female voices. It's 
really cool, but they rarely come in while recording.

Frank
